entry.title: Transaction Replacement by Fee
entry.summary: The sender of the message is seeking information on transaction replacement rules in Bitcoin. They are specifically looking for valid ranges for sequence values in transaction inputs and whether it is possible to change outputs or add more inputs to pay a higher fee. The sender usually sets the sequence value to MAX_UINT32 and locktime to 0. The sender is seeking clarity on this aspect of Bitcoin and would appreciate any resources available.
